title: what if kills after the first gave no gold?
body:
if you die. you become worth no gold until you score a kill/assist


how much would this change the game?

which champions would stop being meta? would become weaker?

would become stronger?


would the game be more fun / enjoyable ?

replies.body: Farming champs would become godly, as kill focused champs would fall so far behind it wouldn't even be funny.  Singed would be at the top of the tier list.
If this were to happen at least no more {{champion:114}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:122}}
The game would get even more boring than it is now, and LCS would turn into a farming competition where nobody wasted time fighting for 95% of the game.

wouldn't that mean their would be no first blood gold? and no it wouldnt because if i get 3 kills on them before they can get even a assist then i'm not being rewarded for playing more weller then them.

you still get the XP and gold advantage.

Additionally there is a 'strategy" around that when you have a feeder. As long as the feeder don't reset constantly the gold flux goes in yur favor after  the early game spike because the shutdown gold is the same for someone that killed 5 different people that someone that killed the same people 5 times, giving the gold is lesser each time.
That will help if you have an intentional feeder on your team.
